CustomField.formula: IF(Location.GDMFSL_Is_Classified__c = FALSE, (Account.BillingStreet & BR() & Account.BillingCity & ", " & Account.BillingState & " " & BR() & Account.BillingPostalCode), "Undisclosed Location")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field populated based on Account and displayed as undisclosed for classified locations
CustomField.label: Billing Address
